official-title.#text:
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to reform the
		  system of public financing for Presidential elections, to establish a system of
		  public financing for Congressional elections, to promote the disclosure of
		  disbursements made in coordination with campaigns for election for Federal
		  office, and for other purposes.

Section 403 of the
			 Bipartisan Campaign Finance Reform Act of 2002
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Bipartisan Campaign Finance Reform Act of 2002/s:403

text.#text:
The amendments made by this section shall apply to actions
			 brought on or after January 1, 2014.

If any provision of this Act or amendment
			 made by this Act, or the application of a provision or amendment to any person
			 or circumstance, is held to be unconstitutional, the remainder of this Act and
			 amendments made by this Act, and the application of the provisions and
			 amendment to any person or circumstance, shall not be affected by the
			 holding.

Except as otherwise
			 provided in this Act, the amendments made by this Act shall apply with respect
			 to elections occurring after January 1, 2014.

This Act may be cited
			 as the
